website_summaries.verdict: If silent operation is a priority, then this is a good stopwatch to consider. No distracting beeps during testing conditions.
pros: Easy to read display and quiet operation
cons: Not as comfortable in larger hands
Does not shut off between uses

customer_reviews.title: The display is easy to read and I love being able to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a PsyD program and having a silent stopwatch for administering assessment tools is a must! I hadn't had any luck trying to convert a regular stopwatch to a silent one, so on a classmate's recommendation I bought this one. It has a time and date function, and a regular stopwatch function. The display is easy to read and I love being able to use this for testing. Highly recommend if you need to be able to time (without your phone) and it has to be a quiet mechanism!
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but Misleading Claims and Incomplete Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel and works fine for basic start, splits and total elapsed times for up to two athletes. It will do much more but the instructions beyond these basic functions are not available or intuitive. The service free warranty as stated on the back label expired before it arrived and the service fee is $10. A good basic product with sloppy implementation with misleading claims and incomplete instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda K. Frantz

customer_reviews.title: It was a lot better using this than a phone app while doing interval ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. I had issues resetting the clock the 2nd time using it. I guess I will read the instructions (I shouldn't have to read instructions to reset it; It has a button that says "split/reset" but it didn't work). It was a lot better using this than a phone app while doing interval training. The phone would go into sleep mode every five minutes. I couldn't find a setting on my iPhone 7 to prevent the phone going into sleep mode = annoying. This product is very light.
customer_reviews.author: RICH

customer_reviews.title: No Annoying Sounds, Large Display, Easy To Use, Durable & Waterproof, Has Time / Date
customer_reviews.text: Sweet stopwatch! This is perfect for checking pop time of catchers, and pitchers pick-off move .. I can use this in the dugout around other players without the annoying sound. I also use it to time 40 & 60-yard dash. Nice large display and the buttons have a firm click. No worries in regarding to dropping or working in the rain. It's well built and is water resistant up to 100 feet. It also has the time & date which is a nice bonus. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joe, Dee, & Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Can't figure out how to set the time
customer_reviews.text: Apparently there are two times, why? I don't know. But I bought this for my 92-year-old father to use as a stop timer so time himself when doing puzzles. Neither one of us can figure it out. It's so complicated. All I needed was start time, stop time and reset but it comes with so many features that get in the way of the stopwatch it's useless for our purposes. I'm sure it works if it was for a young person but for older adults, it's not user-friendly. I do not recommend for anyone over 40.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Terri

customer_reviews.title: Avoid buying this pretty crappy stop watch.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty crappy stop watch. I found the description to be misleading. The only thing this stop watch does from a stop watch perspective is start and stop. Yes you can freeze a cumulative split during a race but you better write it down because there is no recall feature. Furthermore, this watch comes with no instructions. You have to search the internet for instructions. Avoid this stop watch and spend the extra 10 bucks on a stop watch that recalls splits.
customer_reviews.author: BC Miler

customer_reviews.title: Time to look for a different stop watch!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had three of these watches. They’re easy to see and use. However, every one had one or two buttons break within two months or less. A cheaply made product. Certainly not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great Stopwatch - worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, large display and great warranty. If you are looking for a no nonsense stopwatch that you can comfortably take out in inclement weather, this is your stopwatch. There are certainly other stopwatches that are cheaper, but after reading the reviews on many of those I opted to spend a bit more and get this one. I am not sorry that I did. The only complaint that I have and it is is small one is that there was no instruction manual. The brief instructions were printed in the margins on the inside of the packaging. There are some features that are not well explained. Thank goodness for the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Where's Godot?Top Contributor: Classic Rock

customer_reviews.title: Very basic
customer_reviews.text: Does as described. Buttons feel heavy and cheap. Overall feels cheap. But it IS a cheap timer. No real way to toggle between splits. Can only have two splits as well. Inability to toggle between split times is a real hassle, would have bought another timer if I realized this before. Using only for recreational timing hog kids for pre-track training. Works well for this basic need, would highly recommend higher quality for any thing above recreation basic needs for timing.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: I love my accusplit pro survivor
customer_reviews.text: I love my accusplit pro survivor. It's worked very well for my needs. I use it as a timer at swim meets. The display has large numbers that are easy to read with my aging eyes and it seems plenty accurate. The cord is also a great length and allows me to hold it comfortably in my hand while it is around my neck. I imagine I will get many years of good use from this stopwatch. If you are timing multiple swimmers at once or have more complicated needs it might not be the watch for you. But for my needs it's just super.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Porcano

customer_reviews.title: Not always intuitive, but does what you need
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kids to use while working as soccer referees. It has worked great, with the only issue being that the kids don't always know how to use the functions properly and need me to show them. We have had a couple of cheaper versions of this that either stopped working, or had an annoying hourly beep that we couldn't disable. We have not had any of those issues with this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wood

customer_reviews.title: USELESS - Menu Microscopic, Illogical, Irraticly flasshes -
customer_reviews.text: I can read the writing on a pill bottle, but not read the menu display on this "stop Watch" The menu made no sense. The product has no instructions. They are trying to control too many functions with only three buttons, with a menu I literally had to use a magnifying glass to see . The Menu made no sense, and just flashed and scrolled erratically through functions I had no interest in. Annoying Junk ! Returned without a single use.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. It does not come with instructions. After much I found a UTUBE video to watch, however, followed instructions to the letter and still did not work correctly. Always be suspect of a company that is too cheep to include instructions with the product.
customer_reviews.author: LFC

customer_reviews.title: The best I have owned and used so far!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many stop watches over the years and this is the best one so far. Easy to use, easy to read and takes a popular easy to find and install battery. The best thing about it is the buttons. They don't have that stupid and useless electronic ding or beep feature that always goes bad before the rest of the watch to kill it. I use it at night and was a little worried about the lack of back lighting but I never am without a light I use to see so it is not an issue at all. Very nice accurate high quality stop watch, buy with confidence...you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: msinc

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hubs!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a college coach and uses timers constantly when recruiting and during practice. He lost this timer initially when on the road so we replaced it right away. He loves this brand and style and doesn't want to try any other. It has been reliable and great for him! Battery life has been equally wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Three Little Kittens

customer_reviews.title: Flawless stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: This stopwatch has been flawless, not a single error starting or stopping the watch. I am primarily just using it for simple timing (no need for splits etc), and the larger display is easier to read, since I'm not keeping it up near my face. The lanyard has a plastic clip that you can reconnect, which I find useful. I would recommend to anyone. Shipping and packaging were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: That it works.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a vey good stopwatch. To me, it is a good quality plastic device. The stopwatch feature works quite well and that is what I use it for. On the other hand, the clock is hard to set even when following the instructions to the letter. I could not figure out what the "trick" is, it just fails hold after you set it. This is the reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ddmhtm

customer_reviews.title: Great chronograph / stop watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a dead stop watch I had. Didn't want to mess with an app on a slippery smartphone while working at. Man, I'm glad I bought this. Classic stop watch with confident and durable clicking buttons (rather than beeping). Perfect for my needs. One slight complaint: If you push the reset button, it'll reset immediately. I did like that on my last stop watch, you had to hold the button down for two seconds. This prevented you from deleting an important time that you might want to record/write down. In fairness to this stop watch, the buttons do click with authority so you wouldn't accidentally delete a reading here unless you really pushed the reset button.
customer_reviews.author: Willie V. HughesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great stopwatch for the money. I'm a personal trainer and use this to time out boot camp circuits. Simple to use, lightweight, and feels good in my hand. Time will tell on durability, but it seems pretty solid. Not giving 5 stars only because it needs a hair more space between the hours /minutes/seconds on the display ,especially when in clock mode.
customer_reviews.author: clfknit

customer_reviews.title: Fits in your trash can
customer_reviews.text: This item will not work when it arrives. It won’t turn on or anything. But luckily it fit right in my trash can. It fit perfectly in there! So be sure to pop yours in the trash when it arrives to save yourself some time
customer_reviews.author: Drew verderame

customer_reviews.title: Rattles. Does not lend confidence in a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Mine started rattling. Something is loose inside. The buttons are also not very sensitive and <1 second timing can be problematic. I would look for something higher quality next time. It's a stopwatch, it's cheap. It's also only 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AMG Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Kids try to kill it, it does not die
customer_reviews.text: Oh, trusty stopwatch, how you time the tantrums! How you slice out the seconds of screaming into even little seconds! No ABA therapist is without a stopwatch, and this, my friends, is mine. I call her Helga, because Helga sounds a little tough and also like my grandmother who was called Olga. Olga, and her imaginary sister Helga, could handle the tantrums or the self-stimulation of a child on the autism spectrum. And now, with this stopwatch, I can too. FIVE STARS FOR HELGA!
customer_reviews.author: Jia-Li

customer_reviews.title: a very good basic stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basic stopwatch to time one event from start to finish. I do not care about split times, timing 200 people at a time Etc. Like I said for timing one event from start to finish it's perfect. Now you can pause the watch during the one event and resume.
customer_reviews.author: T. McCord

customer_reviews.title: Positive starts and stops.
customer_reviews.text: There is a clear auditory and tactile indication of the start and stop. I don't need to watch the display to make sure it is running. I use it to time the flights of my rubber band powered airplanes and I must watch the plane, not the watch. I also have used it to time the swing of a pendulum to measure gravitational acceleration and the rotation of a torsional pendulum to measure the torsion coefficient of steel wire.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: It has been an excellent tool for timing them for reading and / or ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these years ago for grade school aged boys. It has been an excellent tool for timing them for reading and / or piano practice. The piece is large enough and colorful enough (if you order a color) to be easily found. The stopwatch is sturdy, so much so that I had to cut the straps because the boys were swinging them around and damaging walls and other items. The batteries are still running on all but one of them. It was an excellent purchase for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Conolia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stop watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to use stopwatch. My daughter is in middle school competitive swimming. I volunteered to do back up timing at swim meets. This is the same model they use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RobertB

customer_reviews.title: Really nice stop watch however it doesn’t turn off
customer_reviews.text: The stop watch does it job. Only problem is it doesn’t turn off..
customer_reviews.author: D.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of stopwatch. I’ve used this brand since I started personal training 4-5 years ago and my first watch survived all the wear and tear until one of the buttons finally broke from being in my gym bag and gettin g things dropped on it. Very durable and reliable product!
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: It makes a noise!
customer_reviews.text: One reason I selected this model was because it stated that it did not beep when started or stopped. I use a stopwatch for neuropsychological testing, and I often do not want the examinee to be aware he is being timed. Unfortunately, although the stopwatch does not beep, it makes such a loud clicking sound that it is still obvious to the examinee that he is being timed.
customer_reviews.author: MHK

customer_reviews.title: It works great...
customer_reviews.text: for our purpose. We use it to time my son's math skills and he loves using it and timing himself... he's very competitive, so this motivates him to move faster. If we didn't have this, his assignments would probably take a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t look at splits
customer_reviews.text: Great size but there isn’t a way to go back and look at the splits. I thought it could look at the splits at after but it can’t so not sure what the point of the splits function is. I needed a stop watch for my kid’s swim practice and meets.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz Smada

customer_reviews.title: Timer
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and worked well for the purpose of “beam timing” for my daughters gymnastics meet. The only thing was a little hard to set the date but finally got it done. Everything is good now.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely good for nothing
customer_reviews.text: Worthless, maybe it’s my fault for assuming there was a memory to recall split times. There is not which makes this worthless when coaching and trying to time multiple athletes. Or timing one athlete without carrying pen and paper
customer_reviews.author: Jacob P.

customer_reviews.title: I'll Stick With Timing On An iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to "upgrade" from using my iPhone timing our swim team kids. All the coaches use them so I thought this must be the cool thing to have. I have since gone back to my iPhone. The user interface is completely unintuitive. You can easily loose your split times or mess them up because of this. The iPhone does a much better job of doing splits. If you're only timing one swimmer then its OK. But for that, the iPhone works just as good and I have verified that it is just as accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Xtra Lightweight/Large Display
customer_reviews.text: Super light - can carry it on a run and not even notice it's there. Display is large enough to read without glasses. Fits nicely in palm and buttons work comfortably. The only reason not 5 star is that the display does not light up for those predawn runs / use in dark.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Like tactile feedback and large display
customer_reviews.text: I paid a couple of more bucks for this unit because of the above. I've used it on and off for about a year and it is well worth they money. Minor complaint--the process for viewing and recording split times is a bit disingenuous, especially if you need to record them. When you hit "split," the most recent split time stays on the display even after you hit "stop." In order to see total time you need to hit "split" again. Once you do that, you can no longer view the lap times. This means that if you have more than one lap time, you'll need to record it in between laps.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore L. Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Great silent type stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Great stopwatch nice design and easy to use but most important is the silent no beep button press. But it only has one function which is stopwatch and no others.
customer_reviews.author: Asian Dude

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect....BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: It works just as advertised, is priced right and reliable so I believe it warrants 5 stars. There is nothing wrong with this model....BUT... I would love to have all these same feature AND have a BACKLIT DISPLAY. I can't fault this stopwatch because I knew it was not backlit before I bought it, but seeing as how I usually use it in low light conditions, a BACKLIT DISPLAY would be very very very helpful. Are you listening Accusplit? lol!
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best stopwatch I've had...
customer_reviews.text: I use the stop watches when I'm testing youths. It's the best one I've had so far, but I've never used it underwater, so I can't comment about water resistance. It's easy to use and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Pix76

customer_reviews.title: never made a mistake
customer_reviews.text: I had a stop watch I purchased from the vendor my son's swim team uses, every time I worked as a timer in a swim meet, one button press was taken as two, so the watch stopped when the swimmer just started swimming, I kept raising my hand for backup timers, really embarrassing. Then I found this watch from Amazon, it costed much less then the one I bought from swim team, used this stop watch in 4 swim meet so far, timed perhaps 40 or 50 events, it never made a mistake or cause any error, it really does its job.
customer_reviews.author: White Water

customer_reviews.title: Top of its class
customer_reviews.text: After two years of coaching and two years of stopwatches that broke out of nowhere I finally stepped up and bought this. Only regret is not buying it sooner. The absolute best
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: It came already on and running
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to turn this thing off. This is my first stopwatch and it doesn't arrive with instructions. It had been on for 5 hours when I opened the box and I can't turn it off. It's a shame to waste battery, but otherwise works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Anne rudi

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I suppose this does as advertised so that should make it a 5-star, but there are 2 things that I don't like..... 1) I cannot turn it off --- therefore, it is forever running the battery towards death................. 2) The directions are virtually non-existent. For someone who already knows how to use all the bells and whistles, maybe it's fine, but for me, it left me not having a clue about some of its features....
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive non-atomic stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for "normal" timekeeping as opposed to stopwatching. It has worked well for my purposes. It's plastic, perhaps not the most solid construction; but it does work well. I have noticed it being slightly fast in seconds. Every week, it drifts maybe two seconds faster than the atomic clock which I manually sync it with. I've not found a stopwatch with an atomic/GPS clock, nor do I know what its price range would be. That said, for the product and the price/performance, I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Simple and clear numbers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stopwatch because I need reading glasses and it's a pain to have to switch to reading glasses from sunglasses when I'm outside on the track. With this stopwatch I can see the numbers very easily, and there's no other distraction. It also displays the time when you want it to, which is good because I need to flop back and forth between stopwatch work and clock work.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Faaborg

customer_reviews.title: Always reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought. Only the second because the first one lasted for decades. It's very reliable and easy to use. I wouldn't buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Works well dropped it twice the first day I got it & didn't effect it. Good product looks like it's built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead Silent!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a silent stop watch with no clock or alarm or beep. THIS IS IT! I use it for curling (the sport not the workout) and the big display allows me to wear it around my waist an still see the numbers well. The mode button is recessed so it's difficult to bump. Allows you to use the watch with out worrying that you messed something up.
customer_reviews.author: Chesters

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of small battery-powered LCD timing devices on the market. I've noticed some of these can drain a battery in 6-months or less, while others can go over a decade and still be going strong on the same battery. This stopwatch is one that will last a decade or more. I bought this stopwatch 5 years ago, and the battery is still going strong. This stopwatch does one thing, and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great little timer/stopwatch.
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this as a part time Riving Umpire for tennis officiating to time the warmups and it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Halpern

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The buttons have a "dead" click, with no beep. This puts these accusplit watches above all others for baseball, where you are constantly clicking on each pitch. It's a great watch. The AX 725 pro is even better IMO, basically eliminating the need to ever reset the watch with unlimited splits that continue to run/count off the same buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this stopwatch model and brand because the fitness company I work for uses this exact model so it’s easy for me to practice at home and transfer to work. This is a simple stop watch timer. All I need was a start stop and clear function and it has them. I also like that this doesn’t make any annoying beeping sounds outloud as my previous stopwatch did. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Drago

customer_reviews.title: Not good for clinical practice.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for clinical work (IQ testing, behavior observations) because my trusty old stopwatch died and my phone is cumbersome. This makes loud clicks when the buttons are compressed. Absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: Within 5 minutes of its arrival, the battery died. The packaging said it had a 5 year battery. I replaced the battery with a brand new battery and sent it to school with my son. 2 days later he brought it home and said the battery had died again. It is on its 3rd battery. We shall see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: the button will wear off pretty soon, it's not durable
customer_reviews.text: my second stopwatch, the button will wear off pretty soon , it's not durable, low quality but I like the size, it fits in my hand perfectly and I like the feeling when I press the button.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need it to. Very light. Can wear while exercising. Teen can use easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic on Front is Weak
customer_reviews.text: As a cross-country coach, I bought this stopwatch after reading all of the stellar reviews. The stopwatch functions flawlessly. The only complaint I have is that after wearing it around my neck for a few weeks, I noticed a few big scratches on the plastic screen. I had been very careful with my stopwatch, so I'm not sure how the scratches got there. Nonetheless, I highly recommend the Accusplit Pro Survivor for its functionality, but its screen's durability was rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ad@m

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it does
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised with easy-to-use controls and a readable display. I don't need to track multiple individual split times, just wanted a simple, reliable and easy-to-use stopwatch. This is it. Ive had mine for about six months and its worked perfected with near daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Meister

customer_reviews.title: Be your trainers best friend :)
customer_reviews.text: The trainers at the gym here at work love these! the ones they had were getting old, and the buttons weren't always working, so I bought 3 of these so they all had their own and had no more excuses for extending those sets longer than needed for all of us poor schlubs sweating it out. they have been using these for 7 months now and no issues, so holds up under daily use quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I'm a track official and coach and this serves it's purpose and performs well!
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last Stop Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent stop watch. Have had it for almost 5 years. It remains mainly in my car which gets super hot in the Florida sun and it's still working. OK, granted, it is big and bulky and maybe there are other stop watches at this price that look nicer, but functionally speaking, this stop watch works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Martin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Read reviews on line when looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Read reviews on line when looking for a stop watch. This was a holiday gift for my trainer. I had purchased a cheaper one at a sports. It broke within two weeks. This one is still going strong. Hoping it lasts quite a bit longer. This gets used 8 hours a day five days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Classically styled

customer_reviews.title: Good stop watch for coaches
customer_reviews.text: Directions are terrible. Go to their website for better instructions on setting it up and using it. Works great, and has a clock as well.
customer_reviews.author: guinness

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Doesn’t beep, easy to read. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, solid, and silent
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reliable and professional-looking stopwatch that did not beep upon using the buttons, because I use it to time people's behavior under testing conditions. It works wonderfully. It is actually the second time I purchase this model. The original one I got still works, and I decided to get a second one, just in case I misplace the old one. I was that pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Working well after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these to use at local shooting matches a couple of years ago. All are still functioning great and are on the original batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B.

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. But, it does take a bit to figure out how to change the time and date. So, I will have to keep the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: The device is VERY easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my medical bag when I was taking courses to become certified as a First Responder. The device is VERY easy to use, and the numerals easy to read, which makes taking a person's pulse/respiration rate much easier. I found it simple to use, clear to read, and far superior than a sweep hand on an analog watch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Slaybaugh

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The buttons work perfectly every time unlike other stopwatches I have owned. There is no separate paper with instructions on it. The instructions are on the back of the cardboard that surrounds the watch, so it's important not to throw that away.
customer_reviews.author: M. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift but I'm told they are very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Good watch but I couldn't find any instructions
customer_reviews.text: Works well but without instructions you are left to figure out the controls on your own.
customer_reviews.author: MIGON

customer_reviews.title: During rain/snow I put it in a ziplock bag and its good to go
customer_reviews.text: The little part that holds the cord broke after I had this watch about 2 months. I use it 6 days a week, every week, and it still works. During rain/snow I put it in a ziplock bag and its good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, accurate and a much-loved birthday gift for 9 yr old son!
customer_reviews.text: Who knows if the battery will really last five years as promised, but this stopwatch was an enormous hit for my nine year old son's birthday. We now know the average time of almost all daily activities and athletic effots. My son figured out how to set and use it on his own and wears it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: mama reads

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Stopwatch.
customer_reviews.text: Great stopwatch for the price. Why pay more. Doubt that any other stopwatch would work any better than this on. Very sturdy and very secure buttons for using it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: M. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great and easy to use! Very durable and I am happy with my purchase​.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: im a personal trainer, i use this all the time with my clients instead of my phone. very simple
customer_reviews.author: Jed S.

customer_reviews.title: A-Okay
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews mentioned, realllllly wish there was a lap counter on this thing. Like, what's the point of the extra button if you can't count laps? Also wish there was a way to turn the thing off but I guess it's supposed to last almost forever (jk, few yrs or something like that). Seems pretty sturdy, & the buttons are solid. No problems so far! But if there ever comes to be a stopwatch w/ a lapcounter at a good price, I'm upgrading!
customer_reviews.author: Kjlkarebab

customer_reviews.title: Trusty stopwatch for espresso shots / coffee roasting
customer_reviews.text: I love this stopwatch. Many capabilities and easier to use than pulling out / unlocking my iPhone each time.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stop watch
customer_reviews.text: very nice stop watch that i use when running splits on the track. large buttons makes it easy to use. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: A really great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stopwatch. Lightweight and easy to read. The built-in clock is not the best in the world for long term accuracy, but then, the size of this piece is not something you would want with you at all times for the sole purpose of keeping time anyway. For an economically priced stopwatch, it would be hard to beat. And the replacement battery is readily available at most stores.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Casa Grande

customer_reviews.title: I coach little league and wanted to time my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I coach little league and wanted to time my kids running the bases so I bought this. After the 4th kid ran the bases I hit the stop button and it broke. Piece of junk. F-
customer_reviews.author: ESP

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need it but just wanted one. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L Bouwens

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product less than a month ago. Stop watch works great. String that holds stop watch around neck is connected through a piece of plastic. The plastic snapped and will no longer hold the string. Not a very strong design.
customer_reviews.author: Brian#44

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: i do not like to wear watches on my wrist.. this one can tie to my belt loop or vest pocket... nice BIG face & #s.. also shows month/day... and is a good stop watch if you want that too.. no alarm,, but i am cool with that
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use. I bought another before this and ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. I bought another before this and it was annoyingly complicated. I don't need jazz. I just needed a stopwatch. This fit the bill perfectly. Even the kids could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Wish

customer_reviews.title: This watch does NOT beep
customer_reviews.text: The stop watch doesn't make any audible beeps. Never have I heard of a watch that doesnt make a beep. The description doesnt mention this
customer_reviews.author: Nitrobucket

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use swim team stop watch
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use right from the package. Wish they included a few instructions on how to set the clock, but overall a good stop watch.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Really love how simple they are to use and the big ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second accuplit that I’ve gotten. Really love how simple they are to use and the big display is nice to have. Only reason I am giving 4 instead of 5 stars is because I had to get the new one because the other broke, but lasted a couple years nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better Instructions needed
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for use are not very clear and I am having some difficulty setting up the date and time features. It is not easy for me to figure out. It bought it primarily to use as a timer which I have figured out how to use so will keep for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: JonesJC44

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Read & Use
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the cheap stopwatches supplied by my employer. The numbers are big and easy to read. The buttons don't stick. It's a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: One Woman's Voice

customer_reviews.title: This is the best watch I could find for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best watch I could find for the price. It has never let me down, and has all the functions a normal person needs. It is built well, and has a relatively simple user interface. Easier to use for timing than a smartphone, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Sir

customer_reviews.title: Can feel physical click on buttons so eyes can be on the action.
customer_reviews.text: Faster than a cell phone for things often timed. Big display. Can feel physical click on buttons so eyes can be on the action.
customer_reviews.author: lansorep

customer_reviews.title: Good stopwatch if you need a stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose. Why they can't make a stopwatch with controls that make sense, or with a display that tracks multiple laps in a sensible manner, I'll never know. The buttons on this stopwatch are very responsive, and have a good solid click to them when pressed. It fits comfortably in a hand, and it feels durably constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great stopwatch for home health
customer_reviews.text: Great for home health PT applications. Easy to clean / disinfect and great for time based assessments. A built in countdown timer would be nice but I purchased it knowing it didnt have one.
customer_reviews.author: Iremetal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good! just hopes it doesn't break if I drop it!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I chose this stopwatch. The buttons are sturdy, the digits are easy to read, and the Yellow color is hard to loose. Lanyard comes with!
customer_reviews.author: R. Cary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stopwatch ... except ....
customer_reviews.text: Great stopwatch in every way, except the red colored one I have "bleeds" red all over hot, sweaty hands, and therefore gets on clothing, etc. Other than that, it has simple, intuitive controls, highly visible numbers, and a great, tactile and audible "click" which means you don't have to look down to assure you've started or stopped the timing. If I lost it, would get another, but probably the clear-colored model.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and accurate timer
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable to hold and is able to measure time accurately.
customer_reviews.author: DavidH

customer_reviews.title: Works well; like the large display
customer_reviews.text: Product as described; easy to use; I just miss a little "beep" when you click the start/stop buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: no on/off capacity. okay but not worth the money to me
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviews about the flaw of this item, it dosent have an on off capacity so if you are like me and throw it in a bag, you have to reset it before you use it, whitch can be annoying. The stopwatch dosent always seem to respond to the button commands and sometimes I have to hit buttons several times before it works. It is very basic and not really worth the money
customer_reviews.author: oceanblue

product_meta.title: ACCUSPLIT Pro Survivor - A601X Stopwatch, Clock, Extra Large Display
product_meta.description:
Product Functions

The A601X series is our most popular and durable stopwatch for your basic timing needs.

• It works on the WOS 2.5 Operating system

• It takes Cumulative Splits only (No Lap)

• Split/Release Action

• 1, 2 Fast Finish

• Event/Time Out

• 24 Hour Timing Range

• The Timing interval is 1/100 Second to 40 minutes

• 12/24 Time of Day

• Month and Date

Product Features

• Cased in ACCUSPLIT’s Exclusive “X” Case, with its distinctive, ergonomic design. The “X” Case is immediately recognizable to anyone involved in elite sports

• Million cycle No Fail Buttons (No beep)

• 5 Year, DUAL No Proof of & Proof of Purchase Limited Warranty

• Magnum XL Display for easy viewing

• Water resistant up to 100 feet

• Shock resistant

• Now with 5 year lithium (CR2032) battery (3v & 3v.1 versions) 

• Expected battery life of 5 years

• Available in 5 solid (Black, blue, red, yellow, green) and 5 translucent (Smoke, aqua, cherry, lemon, lime) Case colors.

• RESOLUTION & ACCURACY LIMIT: The internal Quartz and IC controller LOOKS AT SWITCH CLOSURE every 1/256th of a second, so that nearest 1/100 is captured.

• ACTUAL ACCURACY: Tested and calibrated to be within 0.04 sec/hour for 12 months. Only shocks and aging of the quartz crystal affect this actual accuracy rating.



AMAZON.COM


The Accusplit Survivor A601X Stopwatch is the best value PE stopwatch on the market. With the exclusive Accusplit 'X' case design and the million-cycle switch buttons, this is the most durable and popular stopwatch for basic timing needs.

The million-cycle no-fail switches are an Accusplit exclusive and are ergonomically designed for maximum performance and ease of use. They snap instead of beep and have been tested for over a million cycles without failure.

The A601X operates on the Watch Company Operating System (WOS 2.5) used by most watch manufacturers, which employs a two-button system. The right button is used for start and stop, the left for split and release.

The A601X stopwatch features cumulative-split timing. The cumulative time is the capture of elapsed time to current event and consists of all splits beginning to end. The split time is the interval of time measured from the start of the timing to the next pause of time.

The A601X also features the one-button start-split-split system where the first split is first place, the second split is second place, and it shows a one-two fast finish.

This stopwatch is available in five solid and translucent ring colors, has a 5-year battery life, and has a magnum extra-large digital display for exceptionally easy reading.

The A601X is water resistant (up to 30-meters), shock resistant, and includes time and date functions, making it a great low-cost stopwatch for basic timing needs.
feature_bullets: The Best Value PE Stopwatch on the Market
Special Million Cycle Switches operate cleanly, precisely & reliably every time
Magnum XL digits for easy viewing
